note:
You can call us Marenzers!
We're a 30-something, vaguely girl-flavored, stargender 'not-a-person' system of seven.
We use star/they/any pronouns. Seriously, make one up, we'll laugh about it.
We're just here and doing our best.
Don't be a jerk and we'll get along just fine!

Follow us if you want your timeline to be a little bit weirder, but be warned! We're not all roses! We get on that sad, doomer-fueled, wistful kinda bender sometimes.

Federal regulations require me to inform you that this system is lookin' pretty good. We kiss our friends, hand out compliments like candy and just might be cooking up about 20 ideas for the next romantic fanfic in our head while talking to you.

Anyway, welcome to the show. We're glad to have you.
